_comment: Configuration for database schema comparison tool
_mode_comparison: Use both source and target for comparison mode
_mode_dump_only: Omit 'target' to use dump-only mode (requires --generateFullMigrations flag)
_incrementalMode_note: When true, automatically enables skipEmptyFiles and optimizes for incremental diffs
_skipEmptyFiles_note: Skip creation of empty SQL files (cleaner git diffs)
_migrationNumbering_note: 'manual' requires --migrationNumber flag, 'auto' auto-detects next number (future feature)
